option.name: --browser
option.description: The browser to use to open the URL. Set 0 for none.

option.name: --pipe
option.description: Output the raw URL, suitable for piping to another command.

command.name: help
command.help:
The <info>help</info> command displays help for a given command:
<info>php /Users/oripekelman/Sites/platformsh-cli-upstream/platform help list</info>
You can also output the help in other formats by using the <comment>--format</comment> option:
<info>php /Users/oripekelman/Sites/platformsh-cli-upstream/platform help --format=xml list</info>
To display the list of available commands, please use the <info>list</info> command.

option.name: --format
option.description: To output help in other formats

command.name: list
command.help:
The <info>list</info> command lists all commands:
<info>php /Users/oripekelman/Sites/platformsh-cli-upstream/platform list</info>
You can also display the commands for a specific namespace:
<info>php /Users/oripekelman/Sites/platformsh-cli-upstream/platform list test</info>
You can also output the information in other formats by using the <comment>--format</comment> option:
<info>php /Users/oripekelman/Sites/platformsh-cli-upstream/platform list --format=xml</info>
It's also possible to get raw list of commands (useful for embedding command runner):
<info>php /Users/oripekelman/Sites/platformsh-cli-upstream/platform list --raw</info>

option.name: --format
option.description: To output list in other formats

option.name: --browser
option.description: The browser to use to open the URL. Set 0 for none.

option.name: --pipe
option.description: Output the raw URL, suitable for piping to another command.

command.name: domain:add
command.description: Add a new domain to the project

option.name: --cert
option.description: The path to the certificate file for this domain.

option.name: --key
option.description: The path to the private key file for the provided certificate.

option.name: --chain
option.description: The path to the certificate chain file or files for the provided certificate.

command.name: domain:delete
command.description: Delete a domain from the project

command.name: domain:list
command.description: Get a list of all domains

command.name: environment:backup
command.description: Make a backup of an environment

argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of the new environment. For example: "Sprint 2"

argument.name: parent
argument.description: The parent of the new environment

option.name: --force
option.description: Create the new environment even if the branch cannot be checked out locally

argument.name: id
argument.description: The ID of the environment to check out. For example: "sprint2"

command.name: environment:drush
command.description: Run a drush command on the remote environment

argument.name: cmd
argument.description: A command and arguments to pass to Drush

command.name: environment:http-access
command.description: Update HTTP access settings for an environment

command.name: environment:list
command.description: Get a list of all environments

option.name: --pipe
option.description: Output a simple list of environment IDs.

option.name: --show
option.description: Specify information to show about the environment: 'name', 'status', 'url', or 'all'.

argument.name: cmd
argument.description: A command to run on the environment.

argument.name: synchronize
argument.description: What to synchronize: code, data or both

command.name: environment:url
command.description: Get the public URL of an environment

argument.name: path
argument.description: A path to append to the URL.

option.name: --browser
option.description: The browser to use to open the URL. Set 0 for none.

option.name: --pipe
option.description: Output the raw URL, suitable for piping to another command.

command.name: integration:add
command.description: Add an integration to the project

option.name: --token
option.description: An OAuth token for the integration

option.name: --states
option.description: HipChat: states to report, e.g. complete,in_progress

command.name: integration:delete
command.description: Delete an integration from a project

argument.name: id
argument.description: An integration ID. Leave blank to list integrations

argument.name: id
argument.description: The ID of the integration to update

option.name: --token
option.description: An OAuth token for the integration

option.name: --states
option.description: HipChat: states to report, e.g. complete,in_progress

option.name: --no-archive
option.description: Do not create or use a build archive

option.name: --working-copy
option.description: Drush: use git to clone a repository of each Drupal module rather than simply downloading a version.

option.name: --concurrency
option.description: Drush: set the number of concurrent projects that will be processed at the same time.

option.name: --keep
option.description: The maximum number of builds to keep

option.name: --ttl
option.description: The maximum age of builds, in seconds

option.name: --group
option.description: Recreate the aliases with a new group name.

option.name: --pipe
option.description: Output the current group name (do nothing else).

command.name: project:get
command.description: Clone and build a project locally

argument.name: directory-name
argument.description: The directory name. Defaults to the project ID

option.name: --environment
option.description: The environment ID to clone. Defaults to 'master'

option.name: --no-build
option.description: Do not build the retrieved project

command.name: project:init
command.description: Initialize from a plain Git repository

command.name: project:list
command.description: Get a list of all active projects

option.name: --pipe
option.description: Output a simple list of project IDs.

argument.name: path
argument.description: The path to the ssh key

argument.name: id
argument.description: The ID of the SSH key to delete

command.name: ssh-key:list
command.description: Get a list of all added SSH keys

command.name: variable:delete
command.description: Delete a variable from an environment

command.name: variable:get
command.description: Get a variable for an environment

option.name: --pipe
option.description: Output the full variable value only

option.name: --ssh
option.description: Use SSH to get the currently active variables

command.name: variable:set
command.description: Set a variable for an environment
